body:
**Please explain the motivation behind the feature request.**
Bowser use is one of the most useful tools for agents. Unfortunately, most web sites use bot-detection fingerprinting and will enforce captcha-like workflow interruption, which diminishes the value of Goose.
[Camoufox](https://github.com/daijro/camoufox) browser seemto solve this issue.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A MCP server/extension that bundles in camoufox browser and uses for stealthy brouwsing.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Typical  browsers are very easy to fingerpring.


- [x] I have verified this does not duplicate an existing feature request
title: camoufox browser extension?
